textAssessment.loading: Please wait while Artemis is finding the submission!

heading.exampleAssessment: Example Assessment Editor for Text Exercise {{exerciseTitle}}

textAssessment.resultDismissed: Your assessment was dismissed because another tutor already rated this submission.

error.invalidScoreMustBeNumber: The score field must be a number and can not be empty!
error.invalidNeedScoreOrFeedback: Each Feedback item must have at least a score or feedback text.
error.feedbackReferenceTooLong: Please select a text block shorter than 2000 characters.

textAssessment.assessInstruction: Please highlight the text block you want to assess and click the "Assess" button.
textAssessment.lock: You do now have the lock on this submission. Only you can assess this submission. Please assess this submission before opening other submissions.

dashboard.heading: Submissions and assessments of text exercise "{{exerciseTitle}}"

textAssessment.notFound: We haven't found any new text submission without an assessment, please go back.
textAssessment.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel the assessment? Your current assessment progress will be deleted and the submission will be available for assessment to other tutors again.
